title: Handle an Order with Special Instructions
description: A customer adds a note to their order: 'Please gift wrap'. This instruction must be visible to the warehouse packer.

tasks.description: The customer's note is captured with the order.
tasks.expected_outcome: The special instruction is saved on the order record.

tasks.description: When the order is released to the warehouse, the special instruction is flagged and displayed prominently on the packer's screen.
tasks.expected_outcome: The packer is clearly alerted to the gift wrap request.

tasks.description: The packer performs the gift wrapping and confirms the special task is complete before generating the shipping label.
tasks.expected_outcome: The value-added service is performed correctly.
